short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily pick any color on the screen, view a history of picked colors, and copy or clear them with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple color picker extension. Easily pick any color on the screen, view a history of picked colors, and copy or clear them with a single click.
